name: ghost-kraken
description: Kraken tests for Ghost 3.41.1 local instance

scripts.test: npm run gh-start && kraken-node run && npm run gh-stop || npm run gh-stop && rm -rf reports/ .kraken
scripts.gh-start: npm run gh-rm-db && ghost start --no-setup-linux-user -d ghost-local/
scripts.gh-stop: ghost stop --no-setup-linux-user -d ghost-local/ && npm run gh-rm-db
scripts.gh-rm-db: test -f ghost-local/content/data/ghost-local.db && rm -f ghost-local/content/data/ghost-local.db || echo 'DB does not exist'

author: Luis Miguel Guzman Perez
